cycles.title: Terminology normalization

cycles.title: Operator-facing documentation clarity
notes: Rewrote purpose, use cases, and audit commands in imperative technical language.

cycles.title: Architecture narrative precision
notes: Clarified runtime boundary between UI and engine.

cycles.title: Protocol wording hardening
notes: Standardized capitalization and terminology for planes and invariants.
Removed ambiguous phrasing; preserved fail-closed semantics exactly.

cycles.title: Operator script language cleanup
notes: Added explicit stage labels to pre-verification output.

cycles.title: UI localization consistency pass
notes: Improved EN clarity for determinism and rate-limit messages.

cycles.title: Proof/report integration
notes: Integrated language-quality scope into verification summary.
